Package nom.tam.image.compression.hdu

package nom.tam.image.compression.hdu
Compressing and decompressing HDUs, for both images and binary tables. This package supports HDU-level compression only.
See Also:
  • nom.tam.fits.compress
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    nom.tam.image.compression
    Access compressed image tiles individually.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CompressedImageData
    FITS representation of a compressed image.
    CompressedImageHDU
    A header-data unit (HDU) containing a compressed image.
    CompressedTableData
    FITS representation of a compressed binary table.
    CompressedTableHDU
    A header-data unit (HDU) containing a compressed binary table.
